trias 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get taxa information from GBIF

Source: R/gbif_get_taxa.R
gbif_get_taxa.Rd

This function retrieves taxa information from GBIF. It is a higher level function built on rgbif functions `name_usage()` and `name_lookup()`.

gbif_get_taxa(taxon_keys = NULL, checklist_keys = NULL,
  origin = NULL, limit = NULL)

Arguments

taxon_keys

(single numeric or character or a vector) a single key or a vector of keys. Not to use together with `checklist_keys`.
checklist_keys

(single character or a vector) a datasetKey (character) or a vector of datasetkeys. Not to use together with `checklist_keys`.
origin

(single character or a vector) filter by origin. It can take many inputs, and treated as OR (e.g., a or b or c) To be used only in combination with `checklist_keys`. Ignored otherwise.
limit

With taxon_keys: limit number of taxa. With checklist_keys: limit number of taxa per each dataset. A warning is given if limit is higher than the length of taxon_keys or number of records in the checklist_keys (if string) or any of the checklist_keys (if vector)

Value

A data.frame with all returned attributes for any taxa

Examples

# A single numeric taxon_keys
gbif_get_taxa(taxon_keys = 1)
#> [1] "All 1 taxa match GBIF Backbone."
#> # A tibble: 1 x 23
#>     key scientificName nubKey nameKey taxonID sourceTaxonKey kingdom kingdomKey
#>   <int> <chr>           <int>   <int> <chr>            <int> <chr>        <int>
#> 1     1 Animalia            1  2.99e7 gbif:1       156096681 Animal…          1
#> # … with 15 more variables: datasetKey <chr>, constituentKey <chr>,
#> #   canonicalName <chr>, authorship <chr>, nameType <chr>, rank <chr>,
#> #   origin <chr>, taxonomicStatus <chr>, nomenclaturalStatus <lgl>,
#> #   remarks <chr>, numDescendants <int>, lastCrawled <chr>,
#> #   lastInterpreted <chr>, issues <chr>, synonym <lgl>
# A single character taxon_keys
gbif_get_taxa(taxon_keys = "1")
#> [1] "All 1 taxa match GBIF Backbone."
#> # A tibble: 1 x 23
#>     key scientificName nubKey nameKey taxonID sourceTaxonKey kingdom kingdomKey
#>   <int> <chr>           <int>   <int> <chr>            <int> <chr>        <int>
#> 1     1 Animalia            1  2.99e7 gbif:1       156096681 Animal…          1
#> # … with 15 more variables: datasetKey <chr>, constituentKey <chr>,
#> #   canonicalName <chr>, authorship <chr>, nameType <chr>, rank <chr>,
#> #   origin <chr>, taxonomicStatus <chr>, nomenclaturalStatus <lgl>,
#> #   remarks <chr>, numDescendants <int>, lastCrawled <chr>,
#> #   lastInterpreted <chr>, issues <chr>, synonym <lgl>
# Multiple numeric taxon_keys (vector)
gbif_get_taxa(taxon_keys = c(1,2,3,4,5,6))
#> [1] "All 6 taxa match GBIF Backbone."
#> # A tibble: 6 x 23
#>     key scientificName nubKey nameKey taxonID sourceTaxonKey kingdom kingdomKey
#>   <int> <chr>           <int>   <int> <chr>            <int> <chr>        <int>
#> 1     1 Animalia            1  2.99e7 gbif:1       156096681 Animal…          1
#> 2     2 Archaea             2  3.05e7 gbif:2       157030641 Archaea          2
#> 3     3 Bacteria            3  3.05e7 gbif:3       157030707 Bacter…          3
#> 4     4 Chromista           4  3.05e7 gbif:4       157030862 Chromi…          4
#> 5     5 Fungi               5  3.05e7 gbif:5       155647434 Fungi            5
#> 6     6 Plantae             6  3.06e7 gbif:6       155740154 Plantae          6
#> # … with 15 more variables: datasetKey <chr>, constituentKey <chr>,
#> #   canonicalName <chr>, authorship <chr>, nameType <chr>, rank <chr>,
#> #   origin <chr>, taxonomicStatus <chr>, nomenclaturalStatus <lgl>,
#> #   remarks <chr>, numDescendants <int>, lastCrawled <chr>,
#> #   lastInterpreted <chr>, issues <chr>, synonym <lgl>
# Multiple character taxon_keys (vector)
gbif_get_taxa(taxon_keys = c("1","2","3","4","5","6"))
#> [1] "All 6 taxa match GBIF Backbone."
#> # A tibble: 6 x 23
#>     key scientificName nubKey nameKey taxonID sourceTaxonKey kingdom kingdomKey
#>   <int> <chr>           <int>   <int> <chr>            <int> <chr>        <int>
#> 1     1 Animalia            1  2.99e7 gbif:1       156096681 Animal…          1
#> 2     2 Archaea             2  3.05e7 gbif:2       157030641 Archaea          2
#> 3     3 Bacteria            3  3.05e7 gbif:3       157030707 Bacter…          3
#> 4     4 Chromista           4  3.05e7 gbif:4       157030862 Chromi…          4
#> 5     5 Fungi               5  3.05e7 gbif:5       155647434 Fungi            5
#> 6     6 Plantae             6  3.06e7 gbif:6       155740154 Plantae          6
#> # … with 15 more variables: datasetKey <chr>, constituentKey <chr>,
#> #   canonicalName <chr>, authorship <chr>, nameType <chr>, rank <chr>,
#> #   origin <chr>, taxonomicStatus <chr>, nomenclaturalStatus <lgl>,
#> #   remarks <chr>, numDescendants <int>, lastCrawled <chr>,
#> #   lastInterpreted <chr>, issues <chr>, synonym <lgl>
# Limit number of taxa (coupled with taxon_keys)
gbif_get_taxa(taxon_keys = c(1,2,3,4,5,6), limit = 3)
#> [1] "All 3 taxa match GBIF Backbone."
#> # A tibble: 3 x 23
#>     key scientificName nubKey nameKey taxonID sourceTaxonKey kingdom kingdomKey
#>   <int> <chr>           <int>   <int> <chr>            <int> <chr>        <int>
#> 1     1 Animalia            1  2.99e7 gbif:1       156096681 Animal…          1
#> 2     2 Archaea             2  3.05e7 gbif:2       157030641 Archaea          2
#> 3     3 Bacteria            3  3.05e7 gbif:3       157030707 Bacter…          3
#> # … with 15 more variables: datasetKey <chr>, constituentKey <chr>,
#> #   canonicalName <chr>, authorship <chr>, nameType <chr>, rank <chr>,
#> #   origin <chr>, taxonomicStatus <chr>, nomenclaturalStatus <lgl>,
#> #   remarks <chr>, numDescendants <int>, lastCrawled <chr>,
#> #   lastInterpreted <chr>, issues <chr>, synonym <lgl>
# A single checklist_keys (character)
gbif_get_taxa(checklist_keys = "b3fa7329-a002-4243-a7a7-cd066092c9a6")
#> [1] "90 taxa found of which 1 could not be matched to GBIF Backbone."
#> # A tibble: 90 x 33
#>       key scientificName datasetKey nubKey parentKey parent kingdom genus
#>     <int> <chr>          <chr>       <int>     <int> <chr>  <chr>   <chr>
#>  1 1.19e8 Capillaria     b3fa7329-… 9.71e6 159602029 Anima… Animal… Capi…
#>  2 1.19e8 Capillaria cy… b3fa7329-… 7.02e6 119338571 Capil… Animal… Capi…
#>  3 1.19e8 Capillaria (H… b3fa7329-… 7.02e6 119338571 Capil… Animal… Capi…
#>  4 1.19e8 Pseudocapilla… b3fa7329-… 9.78e6 159602033 Trich… Animal… Pseu…
#>  5 1.19e8 Pseudocapilla… b3fa7329-… 8.99e6 119338578 Pseud… Animal… Pseu…

#> #   phylum <chr>, order <chr>, family <chr>, phylumKey <int>, classKey <int>,
#> #   orderKey <int>, familyKey <int>, class <chr>
# Multiple checklist_keys (vector)
gbif_get_taxa(checklist_keys = c("e4746398-f7c4-47a1-a474-ae80a4f18e92",
                            "b3fa7329-a002-4243-a7a7-cd066092c9a6"))

# Limit number of taxa (coupled with checklist_keys)
gbif_get_taxa(checklist_keys = c("e4746398-f7c4-47a1-a474-ae80a4f18e92",

# Filter by origin
gbif_get_taxa(checklist_keys = "9ff7d317-609b-4c08-bd86-3bc404b77c42",
         origin = "source", limit = 3000)
#> Warning: Dataset contains less records than limit.

#> #   threatStatuses <lgl>, synonym <lgl>, species <chr>, speciesKey <int>,
#> #   rank <chr>, genus <chr>, genusKey <int>
gbif_get_taxa(checklist_keys = "9ff7d317-609b-4c08-bd86-3bc404b77c42",
         origin = c("source" ,"denormed_classification"), limit = 3000)
